entry.title: $2450 // newly renovated 2 bedroom apt in Bushwick
entry.content:
Let's get you in to see this recently renovated, spacious, Bushwick, 2 bedroom rental before it's gone.

The unit's highlights include large windows and hardwood floors.

The LED lighting and a chandelier are an added bonus.

You might never need it with NYC's many take-out options, but the apartment's kitchen features tile flooring and a window. You'll find a gas range, an electric oven, plenty of storage, stainless steel appliances, and a dishwasher.

The bedroom has hardwood floors.

Inside the bathroom, you'll find a standard shower, good storage, and a standard tub. There's also a window in the bathroom.

It's rare in NYC, at this price range, to find a building that's loved by tenants and well maintained. This building is exactly that.

For any additional questions and an immediate viewing, please email.

The Mosaic, offers Lux living with stunning artistic designs inside and out, complete with an all inclusive amenity package which includes a full service top of the line laundry room, gym, roof deck, enclosed patio, secured entry and bike storage.

Start your day with a workout, hit the weights after a cardio session in the fitness center. Soak in the sun on the large roof deck that offers breathtaking 360 views of Manhattan. Entertain in the enclosed patio designed with shaded plush seating and barbecue grills.

THE APARTMENTS
The Mosaic offers a mixture of one, two and three beds, with layouts that emphasize modern, comfortable living spaces. All units offer spacious bedrooms and common areas with large double pane windows and double door closets, energy efficient AC and heating units in every room with individualized temperature control , high ceilings, fully equipped chef kitchen with top of the line full size appliances, dishwasher, solid oak hardwood floors and beautiful unique Mosaic tile accents throughout the apartment

Location
The Mosaic, located in one of Brooklyn's hippest hubs. Bushwick Effortlessly meshes Brooklyns avant-garde approach to culture and art with exceptional proximity to many of the boroughs most compelling life, food and arts destinations. A rich mix of longtime neighborhood stalwarts, new transplants seeking the opportunities of the city and residents seeking to live in a nexus of creativity makes this trendy neighborhood an ideal choice for all types of New Yorkers

Transportation
Just a few short blocks from the J/Z @ Kosciuzkso St. and the M @ Central Ave. Easily whip around NYC! Less than a 30 minuet commute to Manhattan

entry.title: $2454 // Brand New Luxury One Br - Amazing Complex - Tons of Amenities - No Fee
entry.content:
Net Price Listed

THE APARTMENTS
The interior aesthetics of the apartments vary, creating diverse spaces that have a sense of local and global style. Open spaces, beautiful sunny views and a sense of both calm and buzzing community are available and threaded throughout the apartments and floors. There is a trifecta of finishes that make each space feel bold and original. Some have clean bright wooden details and artistic flair, some are contemporary and clean with sleek industrial and metallic surfaces and some have more classic dark wood finishes. All are beautiful, cool and modern. Outdoor spaces are available on many. The views of the city, brooklyn and queens, depending on location, are expansive and bright. The units amenities include:
Stainless steel appliances
Dishwasher
Microwaves
Washer and Dryer (In unit)
Hardwood Floors
Central Heat/AC
Bluetooth Capabilities
Outdoor Space/Terraces/Balconies

THE BUILDING
From the moment of entry, Denizen Bswckprovides a new kind of space, it's lobby creates a sense of community, rich with local art, innovative architecture and layered vistas of the parks, retail and recreational spaces available. Spanning two city blocks, this pair of eight story buildings is a 900 hundred unit rental community that extends far beyond the definition of an apartment complex. It is bisected by a pastoral public park and has an innumerable amount of upscale amenities and perks. The Building Amenities include:
Rooftop Pet Run
Mini Golf
Beer Brewery
Wine Brewery
Tenant Lounge
Dog Spa
Playroom featuring rock climbing
Community Chef's Kitchen
Conference Rooms
Parking
Bike Storage
Experience Coordinator
Doorman, Concierge and Package Area
Cold Storage
Co-working space
Private Art Studios
Green Market Area

THE COMMUNITY
From honey bees to aerialists to michelin stars, Bushwick has evolved into a iconic place to live, work and play. It maintains it's raw unpolished vibe while also being home to award winning restaurants, world renowned art and thriving community. The nearby hotspots include, but are definitely not limited to, Robertas, Pinebox, 983 Living Room, Archie's Pizza, House of Yes, The Bakeshop and MOMO sushi.This spot is a three block walk to the JMZ trains a seven minute walk to the L train.
